member.name: T:DG.DemiLib.DeColorPalette
member.summary: Stores a color palette, which can be passed to default DeGUI layouts when calling DeGUI.BeginGUI, and changed at any time by calling DeGUI.ChangePalette. You can inherit from this class to create custom color palettes with more hColor options.

member.param: The HEX color, either with or without the initial # (accepts both regular and short format)
